name: This Just In
description: Tried and testing NBN big Ice deck. Play this one old-school - protect Adonis and Melange, use that money to win.

name: Kate "No Meta" McCAffrey
description: It's not a meta. Optimized for differentet Kind of Corps. Little improvement had to be made if you are going to run on Jinteki. Think about Paratisites and or Medium for other specific decks but Jinteki for Medium (of course).

name: Reina, simply
description:
Very simple build around Reina's cred denial.

Mostly centered around para/datasucker combo. Clone chip recycles parasite just in time.

Caissa stuff is just a slight add-on. It is too expensive to use every turn. Good for surprise last-minute runs.

Worked surprisingly well on OCTGN so far.

name: HB: Barrier Destruction
description:
Ice up with barriers, kill Corroder with targeted destruction. Score behind a wall.

Swordsman is there to try and deal with AI breakers and should only be put out when you see them hit the table. Because all the destruction ICE is Sentry, you should only rez Barriers in order to bait them into dropping the Corroder. Once that is out, start surprise destroying them!

name: Beatwood Mac 2.0
description: Something for every major corp strat. get set up and get in anywhere. Install everything and then sell it later.
